note:
I work in tech: unix (any) sysadmin. One of those weirdos that actively likes managing DNS - if you say "It's always DNS," I'm looking for a new job, consider hiring me and then it won't be.

Open source software; Lua programming; synth DIY; ecology; botany; photography; aerospace; NetBSD user; Map Nerd; railfan; cyclist; NAFO Fella

I don't worry if you don't follow back - do what you want with your timeline.

Too young to be a greybeard, plenty old enough to be a total curmudgeon. My entire account should have a content warning for swearing and alcohol consumption.

Profile photo: detail of a fern's fiddlehead - a bright green new leaf still coiled up into a tiny fractal ball.
Header photo: A NAFO shibu inu dog in a Patagonia sweatervest, attaching Kontakt-1 explosive-reactive armor bricks to a Cray Supercomputer.
